text: Allah jwapele chilanga wakulupilila wachilume ni wakulupilila wachikongwe cha Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo, ni mauto gambone mâ€™Matimbe Gandamo, sano chinonyelo chakuumila kwa Allah ni chachili chekulungwa kusyene. Kwalakweko nikwakuli kupunda kwekulungwa nnope
